transArray.content: The price is really good in Beijing...

Dear guest, hello, thank you for your "full 5-star" review. We will work hard to provide guests with a better stay environment. Orange friends are also working hard to provide the most considerate service to every family member we welcome. I would like to leave you the best stay experience. I hope you can pay more attention to Xiaoju. Xiaojuâ€™s growth is inseparable from your support. I sincerely thank you for your review and look forward to meeting you again after Orange. I wish you a happy life! Hotel Manager: Zhao Dan
